5127eaff-3606-4ee4-b9cd-808d193ce838.name: OOTB - Validate Name, Email Address, and Telephone Number Script
5127eaff-3606-4ee4-b9cd-808d193ce838.description: Script to validate name and email address, sets constraints
5127eaff-3606-4ee4-b9cd-808d193ce838.script:
"/*
 * Form Input Validation Script
 *
 * Author  : Ping Identity  
 * Version : 1.1  
 * Date    : 03/28/2025  
 *
 * This script injects JavaScript to enforce input validation and length constraints
 * on First Name, Last Name, and Email Address fields before submission.
 *
 * Script Inputs  : null  
 *
 * Script Outputs :  
 *    - "errorMessage" (String) - User-friendly error message in case of failure  
 *    - "errorDetails" (String) - Detailed error message for debugging  
 *
 * Outcomes       :  
 *    - "true"  (Validation script injected successfully)  
 *    - "Error" (Unexpected execution failure)  
 */

try {
    /**
     * Returns a JavaScript string that:
     *  - Sets max length (255) for input fields.
     *  - Disables the submit button until all fields are filled.
     *  - Ensures max length is enforced, even if modified in the browser.
     */
    function validateInput() {
        return String(" \n\
            const firstName = document.querySelector('input[data-vv-as=\"First Name\"]'); \n\
            const lastName = document.querySelector('input[data-vv-as=\"Last Name\"]'); \n\
            const emailAddress = document.querySelector('input[data-vv-as=\"Email Address\"]'); \n\
            const telephoneNumber = document.querySelector('input[data-vv-as=\"Telephone Number\"]'); \n\
            const submitBtn = document.querySelector('button[type=\"submit\"]'); \n\
            \n\
            if (firstName) firstName.setAttribute('maxlength', '255'); \n\
            if (lastName) lastName.setAttribute('maxlength', '255'); \n\
            if (emailAddress) emailAddress.setAttribute('maxlength', '255'); \n\
            if (telephoneNumber) telephoneNumber.setAttribute('maxlength', '15'); \n\
            \n\
            const hasFields = firstName || lastName || emailAddress || telephoneNumber; \n\
            if (hasFields && submitBtn) submitBtn.disabled = true; \n\
            \n\
            function validateFields() { \n\
                const phoneRegex = /^\\+?([0-9\\- \\(\\)])*$/; \n\
                const isFirstNameValid = firstName ? firstName.value.trim().length > 0 : true; \n\
                const isLastNameValid = lastName ? lastName.value.trim().length > 0 : true; \n\
                const isEmailValid = emailAddress ? emailAddress.value.trim().length > 0 : true; \n\
                const isPhoneValid = telephoneNumber ? (telephoneNumber.value.trim().length > 0 && phoneRegex.test(telephoneNumber.value.trim())) : true; \n\
                \n\
                if (submitBtn) submitBtn.disabled = !(isFirstNameValid && isLastNameValid && isEmailValid && isPhoneValid); \n\
            } \n\
            \n\
            if (submitBtn) { \n\
                submitBtn.addEventListener('click', (event) => { \n\
                    if (firstName && firstName.value.length > 255 || \n\
                        lastName && lastName.value.length > 255 || \n\
                        emailAddress && emailAddress.value.length > 255 || \n\
                        telephoneNumber && (telephoneNumber.value.length > 15 || !/^\\+?([0-9\\- \\(\\)])*$/.test(telephoneNumber.value.trim()))) { \n\
                        event.preventDefault(); \n\
                        submitBtn.disabled = true; \n\
                    } \n\
                    validateFields(); \n\
                }); \n\
            } \n\
            \n\
            if (firstName) firstName.addEventListener('input', validateFields); \n\
            if (lastName) lastName.addEventListener('input', validateFields); \n\
            if (emailAddress) emailAddress.addEventListener('input', validateFields); \n\
            if (telephoneNumber) telephoneNumber.addEventListener('input', validateFields); \n\
        ");
    }
    
    if (callbacks.isEmpty()) {                
        // Inject the validation script if no callbacks have been executed
        callbacksBuilder.scriptTextOutputCallback(validateInput());
    }

    // Proceed to success path
    action.goTo("true");
} catch (e) {
    // User-friendly error message
    nodeState.putShared("errorMessage", "An error has occurred. Contact support.");
    
    // Detailed error information for debugging
    nodeState.putShared("errorDetails", e.toString());
    
    // Go to Error  
    action.goTo("Error");
}"

94bfadfa-661f-4339-8a91-163cb9747808.name: OOTB - Animated Success Message Script
94bfadfa-661f-4339-8a91-163cb9747808.description: Script to show animated success message tick mark
94bfadfa-661f-4339-8a91-163cb9747808.script:
"/* * Email Update Success Animation Script * * Author : Ping Identity * Version : 1.0 * Date : 03/28/2025 * * Displays a success animation and message when an email is successfully updated. * * Script Inputs: * - null * * Script Outputs: * - "errorMessage" (String) - User-friendly error message in case of failure * - "errorDetails" (String) - Detailed error message for debugging * * Outcomes: * - "true" (Success) * - "Error" (Failure) */ try { /** * Generates and returns a JavaScript function as a string * that creates a success checkmark animation and displays a confirmation message. */ function createAnimatedTickMark() { return String( "function go(obs) { \n" + " const message = document.getElementById('message'); \n" + " if (message) { \n" + " var divSection = document.createElement('div'); \n" + " divSection.id = 'successPage'; \n" + " message.insertBefore(divSection, message.nextSibling); \n" + " divSection.innerHTML = \n" + " `\n" + "
\n" + " \n" + "
`;\n" + " var messageDiv = document.createElement('div'); \n" + " messageDiv.style.marginTop = '16px'; \n" + " messageDiv.innerText = 'Successfully issued credentials to wallet.';\n" + " divSection.appendChild(messageDiv); \n" + " }\n" + "}\n" + "go();\n" ); } /** * If no callbacks are present, generate the script dynamically * and send it to the user interface using `scriptTextOutputCallback`. */ if (callbacks.isEmpty()) { callbacksBuilder.scriptTextOutputCallback(createAnimatedTickMark()); callbacksBuilder.textOutputCallback(0, " "); } action.goTo("true"); } catch (e) { // Store a user-friendly error message nodeState.putShared("errorMessage", "An error has occurred. Please contact support."); // Log the detailed error message for debugging nodeState.putShared("errorDetails", e.toString()); // Redirect to the error outcome action.goTo("Error"); }"

pageDescription.en:
Signing up is fast and easy.
Already have an account? Sign In

message.en:
What you'll need to begin:

  1. Photo Identification
  2. Email Address
  3. Mobile Phone

Please have your Driver's License or U.S. Passport ready to scan for verification.

Your email address and/or phone number may also be verified using a verification code.

What you'll need to begin:

  1. Photo Identification
  2. Email Address
  3. Mobile Phone

Please have your Driver's License or U.S. Passport ready to scan for verification.

Your email address and/or phone number may also be verified using a verification code.

5127eaff-3606-4ee4-b9cd-808d193ce838.name: OOTB - Validate Name, Email Address, and Telephone Number Script
5127eaff-3606-4ee4-b9cd-808d193ce838.description: Script to validate name and email address, sets constraints
5127eaff-3606-4ee4-b9cd-808d193ce838.script:
"/*
 * Form Input Validation Script
 *
 * Author  : Ping Identity  
 * Version : 1.1  
 * Date    : 03/28/2025  
 *
 * This script injects JavaScript to enforce input validation and length constraints
 * on First Name, Last Name, and Email Address fields before submission.
 *
 * Script Inputs  : null  
 *
 * Script Outputs :  
 *    - "errorMessage" (String) - User-friendly error message in case of failure  
 *    - "errorDetails" (String) - Detailed error message for debugging  
 *
 * Outcomes       :  
 *    - "true"  (Validation script injected successfully)  
 *    - "Error" (Unexpected execution failure)  
 */

try {
    /**
     * Returns a JavaScript string that:
     *  - Sets max length (255) for input fields.
     *  - Disables the submit button until all fields are filled.
     *  - Ensures max length is enforced, even if modified in the browser.
     */
    function validateInput() {
        return String(" \n\
            const firstName = document.querySelector('input[data-vv-as=\"First Name\"]'); \n\
            const lastName = document.querySelector('input[data-vv-as=\"Last Name\"]'); \n\
            const emailAddress = document.querySelector('input[data-vv-as=\"Email Address\"]'); \n\
            const telephoneNumber = document.querySelector('input[data-vv-as=\"Telephone Number\"]'); \n\
            const submitBtn = document.querySelector('button[type=\"submit\"]'); \n\
            \n\
            if (firstName) firstName.setAttribute('maxlength', '255'); \n\
            if (lastName) lastName.setAttribute('maxlength', '255'); \n\
            if (emailAddress) emailAddress.setAttribute('maxlength', '255'); \n\
            if (telephoneNumber) telephoneNumber.setAttribute('maxlength', '15'); \n\
            \n\
            const hasFields = firstName || lastName || emailAddress || telephoneNumber; \n\
            if (hasFields && submitBtn) submitBtn.disabled = true; \n\
            \n\
            function validateFields() { \n\
                const phoneRegex = /^\\+?([0-9\\- \\(\\)])*$/; \n\
                const isFirstNameValid = firstName ? firstName.value.trim().length > 0 : true; \n\
                const isLastNameValid = lastName ? lastName.value.trim().length > 0 : true; \n\
                const isEmailValid = emailAddress ? emailAddress.value.trim().length > 0 : true; \n\
                const isPhoneValid = telephoneNumber ? (telephoneNumber.value.trim().length > 0 && phoneRegex.test(telephoneNumber.value.trim())) : true; \n\
                \n\
                if (submitBtn) submitBtn.disabled = !(isFirstNameValid && isLastNameValid && isEmailValid && isPhoneValid); \n\
            } \n\
            \n\
            if (submitBtn) { \n\
                submitBtn.addEventListener('click', (event) => { \n\
                    if (firstName && firstName.value.length > 255 || \n\
                        lastName && lastName.value.length > 255 || \n\
                        emailAddress && emailAddress.value.length > 255 || \n\
                        telephoneNumber && (telephoneNumber.value.length > 15 || !/^\\+?([0-9\\- \\(\\)])*$/.test(telephoneNumber.value.trim()))) { \n\
                        event.preventDefault(); \n\
                        submitBtn.disabled = true; \n\
                    } \n\
                    validateFields(); \n\
                }); \n\
            } \n\
            \n\
            if (firstName) firstName.addEventListener('input', validateFields); \n\
            if (lastName) lastName.addEventListener('input', validateFields); \n\
            if (emailAddress) emailAddress.addEventListener('input', validateFields); \n\
            if (telephoneNumber) telephoneNumber.addEventListener('input', validateFields); \n\
        ");
    }
    
    if (callbacks.isEmpty()) {                
        // Inject the validation script if no callbacks have been executed
        callbacksBuilder.scriptTextOutputCallback(validateInput());
    }

    // Proceed to success path
    action.goTo("true");
} catch (e) {
    // User-friendly error message
    nodeState.putShared("errorMessage", "An error has occurred. Contact support.");
    
    // Detailed error information for debugging
    nodeState.putShared("errorDetails", e.toString());
    
    // Go to Error  
    action.goTo("Error");
}"
